text: Aryam Abreu Delgado, Toluca 2011 Aryam Abreu Delgado (born 9 July 1978) is a Cuban chess Grandmaster (2008). Best results: 2nd at Albarino Open, Spain 2005; 1st at the Villa de Mislata Open in Spain 2005; 4th in the Cuban Championship 2007; 1st-2nd at the Capablanca Memorial Open 2008; 1st at the Villa de Bilbao Rapid 2008. His best Elo rating was 2502 in 2008. == References == ==External links== * Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Living people Category:Cuban chess players Category:1978 births
title: Aryam Abreu Delgado
